message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you get a decent start.
That's not fair, Alice. I'm proposing a more balanced split. Take it or lose out to inflation!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a larger share. This is my final offer before inflation eats away at our gains.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Inflation is hurting us both. I'm making my final offer - meet me in the middle!
